text: Oligocentria is a genus of moths in the family Notodontidae, the prominents. Species include:Oligocentria. Integrated Taxonomic Information System (ITIS) *Oligocentria alpica (Benjamin, 1932) *Oligocentria coloradensis (H. Edwards, 1885) *Oligocentria delicata (Dyar, 1905) *Oligocentria laciniosa (H. Edwards, 1885) *Oligocentria lignicolor (Walker, 1855) - white-streaked prominent *Oligocentria pallida (Strecker, 1899) *Oligocentria paradisus (Benjamin, 1932) *Oligocentria perangulata (H. Edwards, 1882) *Oligocentria pinalensis (Benjamin, 1932) *Oligocentria semirufescens (Walker, 1865) - red-washed prominent *Oligocentria violascens (Herrich-Schäffer, [1855]) ==References== Category:Notodontidae
title: Oligocentria
